name: Insane Hockey Online ! - FREE
description:
[ Brand New Features !!! ]

* Online Mode - Play with your friends with simple steps! All over the world.

* Insane BOT - "I bet you cannot win it !!!"

* Frozen Theme - More Coming...

[ How to play multiplayer ]

1. Enter the login screen of the multiplayer mode (blue globe button)
2. Enter "name ID"
3. Click the green start button

* Extra: If you want to match your friends accurately, please press the blue and white dots and enter the same "Room" to play.

[ Developing ]

* 2P vs 2P - Fun Fun Family

* Ranking System - Show Time !

~~~ More Developing ~~~

Please tell me if some bugs or want some new features. Thanks

Contact: fimrix.development@gmail.com
